outputs.output_descr:
To strengthen the Capacity of the Covernment to coordinate, Monitor and Evaluate the CP there is a need to develop the capacity of partners and UNDP CO staff. This component will provide advisory service to the Government and UNDP Senior Management on CPAP Coordination, RMB and M&E, to achieve the following Project Outputs:
	Project Output 1: Technical capacity of implementing partners (IP's) and UNDP country office staff strengthened on the RBM/PME (planning, monitoring and evaluation). 
	Project Output 1: Institutional capacities of MINEC and UNDP maintained in support for the effective delivery of the country programme. 
	Project Output 3: The country programme monitored and evaluated according to their efficiency/effectiveness, relevance and sustainability.
	Project Output 4: The coordination capacity of MINEC enhanced for the implementation of the country programme.
	Project Output 5: Annual NIM/NGO audit exercise completed on time.

Achieving results requires not only skills in programme and project management, but also specific expertise and competencies in managing for results. Therefore UNDP endeavours to create a strong understanding of the RBM concepts among the CO staff and its partners. 
In order to contribute to the CPD Outputs, the project will aim to achieve the following Project Outputs:
Output 1: Technical capacity of implementing partners (IP's) and UNDP country office staff strengthened on the RBM/PME (planning, monitoring and evaluation). 
Output 1: Institutional capacities of MINEC and UNDP maintained in support for the effective delivery of the country programme. 
Output 3: The country programme monitored and evaluated according to their efficiency/effectiveness, relevance and sustainability.
Output 4: The coordination capacity of MINEC enhanced for the implementation of the country programme.
Output 5: Annual NIM/NGO audit exercise completed on time.
